instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Central Khmer language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: អ្នកកាសែតទូរទស្សន៍មួយដែលបានបង្កប់ជាមួយកងទាហានជើងទឹកបានកត់ត្រាការសម្លាប់នោះនៅក្នុងខ្សែអាត់វីដេអូនោះ។
output: A television journalist embedded with the Marines recorded the killing on videotape.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Central Khmer language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ISP ដែលល្អបំផុត ដូចដែលបោះឆ្នោតដោយអ្នកឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងការស្ទាបស្ទង់មតិ គឺមានការផុលផុស ដែលធ្វើឲ្យគេឈ្នះនៅឆ្នាំទីបីទៀត។
output: The best ISP, as voted by the survey respondents, was Inspire, the third consecutive time they have won.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Central Khmer language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: គាត់បានប្រាប់អ្នកទស្សនាថា វាគឺជា"ការប្រគុំដន្ត្រីចុងក្រោយក្នុងជីវិតរបស់គាត់" ហើយក៏ចាកចេញពីឆាក។
output: He told the audience that it was "the last concert of his life," and left the stage.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Central Khmer language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: គណៈកម្មាធិការស៊ើបអង្កេតម៉ូស្គូសំគាល់ជនសង្ស័យថាជាអ្នកទោសពីមុនសេរហ្កេយផូម៉ាសុន។
output: The Moscow Investigative Committee identify the main suspect as former convict Sergei Pomazun.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Central Khmer language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: ផ្លូវនេះត្រូវបានបិទដើម្បីគេអាចធ្វើការស៊ើបអង្កេតបាន ប៉ុន្តែត្រូវបានបើកឡើងវិញចាប់តាំងពីពេលនោះមក។
output: The road was closed so that investigations could be carried out but has since been reopened.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Central Khmer language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: "វាលេចឡើងថា ជនរងគ្រោះត្រូវបានវាយប្រហា នៅពេលពួកគេបានឈរ នៅមាត់ផ្លូវនៃក្លឹបរាត្រី។"
output: "It appears the victims were targeted by the suspect as they stood at the entrance to the nightclub."
